question: Is it true that Muhammad (SAW) never gave azaan? & is the reason mentioned in the above a valid reason? if not what was the reason of Muhammad (SAW) never calling out
answer:
QUESTION

"Woh Konsa Kaam hai jis k karney waley ko Allah ?(SWT) buhut pasand karta hai magar Hazrat Muhmmad (SAW) ne woh kaam nahi kia. Answer: Muhammad (SAW) ne kabhi azaan nahi di thi, quon k agar Aap (SAW) azan daitey to shayad kainat ki her cheez masjid mein aa jati aur nizam - e- kaynat tabah ho jat."

Is it true that Muhammad (SAW) never gave azaan? & is the reason mentioned in the above a valid reason? if not what was the reason of Muhammad (SAW) never calling out azaan?

 

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful

Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatuh

Rasulullah (sallallahu alayhi wasallam) used to be the Imam. He appointed some Sahaba to call out the Azaan. It is not recorded that Rasulullah (sallallahu alayhi wasallam) called out the Azaan.

 

The reason explained for Rasulullah (sallallahu alayhi wasallam) not calling out the Azaan has no basis. If that was the case, the mission of Rasulullah (sallallahu alayhi wasallam) could be easily fulfilled by him giving one Azaan and all his enemies would come to the musjid.

And Allah knows best

Wassalam

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
Darul Iftaa
